body: Full censorship sucks ass, but the fact that there's no webtoon support is just sad
I  understood all the referencies! (I loved the berserk one)

The main problem with webtoons is how they cut pages in the middle of an image or dialogue- hate that. Why did they waste so much time setting up a diarrhea joke that just fell flat? The bartender was hot but the chick on the train was smoking hot! And I want to see him grudge fuck Bomi and make her beg for it.

I want more, I wanna laugh
Who's the author, I can't find it on here
Yeah i agree. This is more of a comedy than anything. Laughed my ass off most of the time
